name: Tech Town Insourcing
tagline: Got an IT project that needs doing? Tech Town has the answer.
body:
Step 1 

Upload your job spec and any other information here

Step 2

Tech Town will then contact you for a video conference to discuss next steps

Step 3

A hand-picked team of Tech Town staff, along with our team of experienced project managers will finish your work to the highest
quality standards - spec'ing, developing and testing.


Step 4

We deliver the finished project onto your systems.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
